page.title: 04 WOODSPEEN
page.content:
WOODSPEEN IS ONE OF THE OLDEST COTTAGES IN STONE.IT WAS BUILT IN ELIZABETH 1 TIME AS TWO WOODMANS COTTAGES.
BOTH COTTAGES HAD TWO ROOMS,ONE UP ONE DOWN.BOTH FAMILIES HAD A BIG OPEN FIRE PLACES WITH THE CHIMNEYS GOING BACK TO BACK UP THE MIDDLE.ONE COTTAGE HAD A BIG BREAD OVEN WHICH BOTH FAMILIES WOULD USE.
EACH FAMILY CONSISTED OF ABOUT SIX CHILDREN TWO PARENTS AND TWO GRANDPARENTS.
THE ROOF WAS THATCHED WITH THE CHIMNEYS OF BRICKS.MUCH LATER ON TWO STABLES WERE BUILT PROBABLY FOR OXEN AND HORSES.
